title: Happy Birthday Junior, Lion King, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Happy Birthday Junior, Lion King, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning everybody and welcome to Throwback Thursday.  Happy Birthday Junior.  Junior shares with us his fondest birthday memories and the crew talk about their favorite Junior moments.  The Lion King hits theaters today and we get the lost auditions.  Junior blesses us with some of his birthday poetry.  We continue the birthday celebration with a special guest.  Junior's mom Miss Alicia calls in to tell us about her baby boy.  Sheryl Underwood stops by and gives us the reasoning for Trump's removal from office.  Miss Carla covers Real Housewives of Potomac in Reality Update.  Apparently Junior has a secret admirer from the state of Alabama.  The show wraps up and J's What Did We Learn focused on what new things we learned about our very own Junior on his birthday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
